plays.text: Goal scored by Chris Drury assisted by Ville Nieminen
Penalty to Pascal Trepanier 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Pascal Dupuis
Penalty to Chris Drury 2 minutes for Tripping Jim Dowd
Penalty to Matt Johnson 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Jason Marshall 2 minutes for Crosschecking Chris Drury
Penalty to Dwayne Roloson 2 minutes for Tripping Ville Nieminen served by Antti Laaksonen

Penalty to Dan Hinote 2 minutes for Elbowing Dwayne Roloson
Penalty to Dan Hinote 2 minutes for Roughing Jason Marshall served by Ville Nieminen
Penalty to Sergei Zholtok 2 minutes for Roughing Dan Hinote
Penalty to Sebastien Bordeleau 2 minutes for Slashing(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Milan Hejduk 2 minutes for High Sticking Filip Kuba
Penalty to Milan Hejduk 2 minutes for High Sticking Filip Kuba
Penalty to Andrew Brunette 2 minutes for High Sticking Eric Messier
